name: @niivue/streamlit
description: NiiVue Streamlit component with Python and TypeScript integration

scripts.clean: cd niivue_component/frontend && pnpm clean && cd ../.. && rimraf dist build *.egg-info
scripts.release:test: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && python -m build && python -m twine upload --repository testpypi dist/*
scripts.release:prod: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && python -m build && python -m twine upload dist/*
